程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.hbase

接口 ConnectionMask

所有超级接口:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
所有已知实现类:
HConnection1_0
public interface ConnectionMask
extends Closeable
This interface hides ABI/API breaking changes that HBase has made to its (H)Connection class over the course of development from 0.94 to 1.0 and beyond.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    AdminMask getAdmin()
    Retrieve the AdminMask compatibility layer object for this Connection.
    List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionLocation> getRegionLocations​(String tableName)
    Retrieve the RegionLocations for the supplied table name.
    TableMask getTable​(String name)
    Retrieve the TableMask compatibility layer object for the supplied table name.

    从接口继承的方法 java.io.Closeable

    close

  • 方法详细资料

    • getTable

      TableMask getTable​(String name) throws IOException
      Retrieve the TableMask compatibility layer object for the supplied table name.
      参数:
      name -
      返回:
      The TableMask for the specified table.
      抛出:
      IOException - in the case of backend exceptions.

    • getAdmin

      AdminMask getAdmin() throws IOException
      Retrieve the AdminMask compatibility layer object for this Connection.
      返回:
      The AdminMask for this Connection
      抛出:
      IOException - in the case of backend exceptions.

    • getRegionLocations

      List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionLocation> getRegionLocations​(String tableName) throws IOException
      Retrieve the RegionLocations for the supplied table name.
      参数:
      tableName -
      返回:
      A map of HRegionInfo to ServerName that describes the storage regions for the named table.
      抛出:
      IOException - in the case of backend exceptions.
